description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $973.1K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Quorus Consulting Group. The average
  contract duration was 0.85 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $107.5K. The longest
  contract was 2.13 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $245.9K.
lookup_name: 'QUORUS CONSULTING GROUP'

most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '45'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '11'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '24%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '37%'

s421_mean_contract_value: '107.5K'

s422_max_contract_value: '245.9K'
